thread.section_title: Marché Provence Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Marché Provence | marcheprovence.com
thread.title: Anne Lloyd
thread.title_full: Marché Provence reviewed by Anne Lloyd

author: Anne Lloyd
title: Anne Lloyd
text: I couldn't find these real French prints anywhere else in the USA - The colors are beautiful and the prints detailed and gorgeous. I'm a purist when it comes to my linens and I don't like American versions of French prints. The personal attention to my order was amazing. Great company. Shipping fast. I LOVE these placemats. Thank you!!!
